explanation: [0-0] At the scene of a football match, with SIEMENS and other brands visible on advertising boards in the background, players in red jerseys are competing against players in blue jerseys. In the middle of the screen, there is a caption: "This Lewandowski Rabona" and a blue figure with a matching expression.

[0-4] A player in a red jersey lifts his foot and kicks the ball forward. A player in a blue jersey attempts to block the ball but fails, and the ball continues to fly forward. As the player and the ball move forward, the surrounding scenery moves backward. Soon the ball approaches the goal, where a goalkeeper in a green uniform is standing. A player wearing a red jersey with the number nine runs to the front of the ball, his jersey bearing the number nine on the back. Then the player in the red number nine jersey kicks the ball, bringing it closer to the goal. The goalkeeper in green stretches out his hands, ready to prevent a goal. Then a player in a blue jersey intercepts the ball and kicks it. Subsequently, the player in the red number nine jersey jumps with both feet, and the ball flies far to the right.

[4-12] The scene then switches to the player in the red number nine jersey, with blue and gray stands in the distance in front of him. On the field, there are other people wearing red and yellow clothes. The man in the red jersey crosses his legs and kicks the ball forward. The next shot shows two players in blue jerseys in front of him stretching out their feet to block, but the ball flies between them. Then the camera zooms out, and players in blue and red jerseys are all scrambling for the ball. Then a player in a red jersey kicks the ball into the goal. The goalkeeper falls to the ground. Then the caption "Was the assist better than the goal?" appears in the middle of the screen.
